achievements: Known for his ruthless ambition and political maneuvering.
Subject of numerous works of art and literature.
Author of 'On Crimes and Punishments', a seminal work on criminal justice reform.
Advocate for the abolition of torture and the death penalty.
Pioneer in the field of criminal anthropology.
Developed theories linking physical characteristics to criminality (now largely discredited).
Managed several Italian football clubs, including Fiorentina and Juventus.
Led the Italian national team to the final of UEFA Euro 2012.
